questions.question: An ML engineer wants to automate the hyperparameter tuning of their machine learning model using Amazon SageMaker. To minimize costs, they also want to utilize spot instances during the tuning process. Which combination of factors must the engineer specify to initiate the automatic tuning process in SageMaker?
questions.topic: Deployment and Orchestration of ML Workflows
questions.Practice test: AWS Machine Learning Engineer - Associate Practice Test 1
